snippet: The City Council of the gambling-rich upstate enclave passed a resolution this week opposing a New York State law that could permit a full-scale casino in the town.
abstract: Saratoga Springs City Council passes resolution opposing New York State law that could permit full-scale casino in town; resolution comes after months of debate in upstate enclave, which is home to world-renowned horse racing track and Saratoga Casino and Raceway; many argue that proposal to place 'destination resort casino' could damage vibrant downtown and other local businesses.
lead_paragraph: The City Council of the gambling-rich upstate enclave passed a resolution this week opposing a New York State law that could permit a full-scale casino in the town.

headline.main: Saratoga Springs Voices Opposition to Casino Law
headline.print_headline: Upstate Gambling Town Voices Opposition to Casino Law
